t = int(input())
for bunny in range(t):

    s = input()
    count = 0
    i = 0
    while i < n:

            count += 1
            i += 2
        else:
            count += 1
            i += 1
    print(count)

for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    a = set(s)
    counter = 0
    for let in a:
        x = s.count(let)
        mult = s.count(let + let)
        counter += x - mult * 2 + mult
    print(counter)

t = int(input())
for u in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    s = input().strip()
    x = s[0]
    i = 1
    p = s[0]
    count = 0
    while i < n:
        if x == s[i]:
            p += s[i]
        else:
            count += len(p) // 2 + len(p) % 2
            p = s[i]
        x = s[i]
        i += 1
    count += len(p) // 2 + len(p) % 2
    print(count)

i = int(input())
x = 0
list1 = []
while x < i:
    k = int(input())
    p = input() + '$'
    ii = 0
    tot = 0
    while ii < k:
        if p[ii] == p[ii + 1]:
            tot = tot + 1
            ii = ii + 2
        else:
            tot = tot + 1
            ii = ii + 1
    list1.append(tot)
    x = x + 1
for ele in list1:
    print(ele)
